name: Delilah's Otherworldly Adventure - Concept Demo
description:
This is an experimental demo for "Delilah's Otherworldly Adventure", a cutesy side-scrolling (but not limited to) adventure game. Please enjoy playing! If you want, you can even send feedback by commenting. If enough people like and support the concept, then a full version will be more likely to be made.

In this game you play as Delilah, a punky do-gooder who likes being the hero in the wacky world she knows as home. Trouble strikes when an artifact is stolen from a local museum. This leads Delilah and her best friend Molly on an expedition to retrieve the artifact from the apparent thieves; a little red guy and a talking kiwifruit......yep you read that right!

Some bugs may have slipped through the cracks as this is the first public build.
